keyword: calories in krispy kreme glazed donut
title: Calories in Krispy Kreme Glazed Donut
meta_description: Discover calories in Krispy Kreme glazed donut, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in Krispy Kreme Glazed Donut
assumptions: Standard Original Glazed donut (52 g), fresh from Krispy Kreme, no additional toppings or fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, size, and store preparation. Values based on official Krispy Kreme data; check packaging or app for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Krispy Kreme glazed donut has 190 kcal, with 22 g carbs and 11 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Krispy Kreme glazed donut?
faqs.a: 190 kcal per standard Original Glazed donut.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Krispy Kreme glazed donut?
faqs.a: About 22 g total carbs, including 10 g sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is there protein in Krispy Kreme donuts?
faqs.a: Yes, around 2 g protein per glazed donut.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a Krispy Kreme glazed donut?
faqs.a: 11 g total fat, with 5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Do Krispy Kreme glazed donuts have cholesterol?
faqs.a: 0 mg cholesterol in the standard glazed variety.
